question: Analyze the technology adoption trends of companies within the finance industry over the last three years.
subtasks: [{"step":1,"task":"Identify and retrieve data for companies in the finance industry, including their technology stacks and financial metrics (revenue, net income).","table":["CompanyInfo","CompanyTechStack"]},{"step":2,"task":"Filter the technology adoption data to include only entries from the last three years to analyze recent trends.","table":["CompanyTechStack"]},{"step":3,"task":"Aggregate and analyze the revenue data of the identified finance companies to understand the relationship between technology adoption and financial performance over the specified period.","table":["CompanyInfo"]},{"step":4,"task":"Cross-reference the technology adoption data with related contracts from technology vendors to assess the extent of collaboration in the finance industry, focusing on any major shifts in technology partners or service types used.","table":["CompanyDealMaster","CompanyVendorTechDetail"]}]
